notes_display: Medal commemorates British military victories over France at Quiberon, Niagra, Quebec, Louisbourg.  FŒDUS INVICTUM translates to: "an unconquerable alliance"
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Britannia seated on cart drawn by a lion, trampling on French lilies, accompanied by Liberty and Justice.  Legend surrounds, paying homage to the successes of 1758.
issue_obverse_legend_s: LOUISBOURG . IUL . 27 . FRONTI . AUG . 27 . DUQUESNE . NOV . 24 . GOREE . DE . 29 * SENEGAL . MAI . 2 . SMALOS . IUN . 16 . CHERBOURG . AU . 16 . | AMHERST . BRADSTREET . FORBES . KEPPEL . MARSH MASON . MARLBRO . HOW . BOSCAWEN - | FŒDUS INVICTUM . | MDCCLVIII .
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Reversed lily on shied in center.  Lion wearing crown on left, hornless unicorn on right.  Legend surrounds, paying homage to the successes of 1759.
issue_reverse_legend_s: QUEBEC WOLFE MONCH N . TOWNS D . SEP . 13 & . 18 | CROWN POINT AMHERST AUG . 4 | LAGOS BOSCAWEN AUG . 19 | MINDEN FERDINAND AUG . 1 | GUADALOUPE BARING N . MOORE MAY . 1 | NIAGARA IOHNSON IULY . 25 | HAWKE QUIBERON NOV . 20 | PERFIDIA EVERSA | W . PITT AUSP . GEO . 11 PR . MI . | MDCCLIX
